name: I Hate Possessions
description:
I Hate Possessions, a ghostly FNAF parody that has no swearing whatsoever.

This is a sequel to my game "I Hate Puppets", which is a sequel to my game "I Hate People"

You can find both at 

https://zapizard.itch.io/ihatepeople 

https://zapizard.itch.io/ihatepuppets

In this game you play as Mr Ghost Hunter Man, after the events of the previous two games you investigate the office complex and get trapped for a night... then you decide to keep going back every night for absolutely no reason.

Music in this game is from Party in Backyard.
